about_the_game:
Explore a world of turn based RPG but every move has been replaced with dice rolls.

Tactical Dice Combat: Engage in strategic battles where every roll matters. With each character wielding their own dice, the outcome of your attacks, defenses, and abilities are in the hands of chance. Adapt, strategize, and roll your way to victory!

Customizable Dice Heroes: Discover fragments scattered throughout the world and unlock new party members to join your quest. Customize each die face with shards found in chests or earned from vanquished foes. Craft the perfect combination of abilities and unleash the full potential of your party!

Chance and Choice: Embrace the unpredictability of the dice as you face enemies and make crucial decisions. With the outcome of battles, the loot you discover, and the fate of your party all determined by the roll of the dice, every moment is a thrilling gamble.

The choice is out of your hands, its in the dice you just threw.
